title: Definition of the Slope of a Line
text: The slope of a line is $$m=\frac{rise}{run}$$. The rise measures the vertical change and the run measures the horizontal change between two points on the line.

title: Choosing Two Points
text: We locate two points on the line whose coordinates are integers. We then start with the point on the left and sketch a right triangle, so we can count the rise and run.
